title: Shepherd's pie with red wine
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon sunflower oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '50g mushrooms, sliced', '500g minced lamb', '235ml red wine', '1 to 2 cloves garlic, chopped (or to taste)', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 large splash Worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon runny honey', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '500ml lamb stock', '2 to 3 medium carrots, grated', '900g potatoes, peeled and quartered', '85g butter', '3 tablespoons milk', '40g Cheddar cheese, grated', '3 teaspoons mint jelly']
